channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 据一位顶级银行家称，由于沙特阿拉伯王国的主权财富基金希望为其雄心勃勃的项目筹集资金，今年沙特阿拉伯的交易活动将加速进行。
item.description: Deal activity in Saudi Arabia is set to accelerate this year as the kingdom’s sovereign wealth fund looks to raise money for its ambitious projects, according to a top banker trib.al/vKapNgZ

item.title: 以下是伦敦金融城及其他地区的最新新闻和见解
item.description: Here's the latest news and insights from the City of London and beyond trib.al/UySpy1Q

item.title: 铁矿石暴跌，中国重开后需求仍存疑虑
item.description: Iron Ore Slumps as Demand Doubts Persist With China’s Reopening trib.al/pYaxA3i

item.title: 拉马福萨的气候委员会称南非政府的能源计划不足以解决能源安全问题，并可能违反空气污染法
item.description: Ramaphosa's climate commission says South African government's energy plan is inadequate to tackle energy security and may breach air pollution laws trib.al/qTTwq7Z

item.title: 丹麦市政雇员与政府达成协议，同意在两年内平均加薪 6.5%，以应对通货膨胀的上升
item.description: Denmark’s municipal employees reach a deal with the government agreeing to an average 6.5% increase in salaries over two years to counter the rise in inflation trib.al/RveE64R

item.title: 去年，中国前三大风力涡轮机制造商巩固了其在国内市场的地位，在装机量飙升至创纪录水平的同时，也挤压了国内外竞争对手的生存空间。
item.description: China’s top three wind turbine makers consolidated their hold on the nation’s domestic market last year, squeezing out local and foreign rivals as installations surged to a record trib.al/QFv2u9E

item.title: 据一位反对党议员称，韩国五大金融公司因 20 万亿韩元的海外房地产投资而面临约 7.49 亿美元的损失。
item.description: South Korea’s five largest financial companies are facing about $749 million of losses from their 20 trillion won of overseas real estate investments, according to an opposition party lawmaker trib.al/WSvTN81

item.title: 英美铂金公司提议对其业务进行重组，这可能会影响到其南非业务部门的约 3,700 个工作岗位
item.description: Anglo American Platinum proposes a restructure of its business that may affect about 3,700 jobs across its South African operations trib.al/dzGwApD

item.title: 韩国计划大幅增加医学院的招生名额，这促使更多优秀学生报名参加备考学习，以成为医生--而不是曾经稳赚不赔的成为制造半导体的工程师。
item.description: A South Korean plan to greatly increase medical school seats has helped prompt more top students to enroll for exam-prep studies to become doctors — over the once sure-fire bet of trying to become engineers who make semiconductors trib.al/owOS2m1

item.title: 英国央行前首席经济学家安迪-霍尔丹（Andy Haldane）警告说，如果英国央行不尽快转向降息，就有可能加深英国的经济衰退。
item.description: The Bank of England risks deepening the UK’s recession if it doesn’t pivot to interest-rate cuts soon, its former chief economist Andy Haldane warns trib.al/oEYWgBz

item.title: 在欧洲开始新的一天需要知道的五件事
item.description: Five things you need to know to start your day in Europe trib.al/fpAzBWt

item.title: 高盛上调标准普尔 500 指数预期
item.description: Goldman boosts its forecast for the S&P 500 trib.al/U8KMASl

item.title: 在一项民意调查中，日本首相岸田文雄的不支持率创下历史新高，因为选民对许多人认为岸田文雄在党内领导人选举前几个月清理政治丑闻方面存在的不足表示不满。
item.description: The disapproval rate of Japanese Prime Minister Fumio Kishida hit a record in a poll, as voters showed dissatisfaction with what many see as shortcomings in clearing up political scandals months ahead of a party leadership election trib.al/azuNIYR

item.title: 据知情人士透露，总部位于上海的汽车租赁公司易嗨用车正在考虑重返美国资本市场，进行首次公开募股，最快可能在今年募集到约 3 亿美元资金。
item.description: eHi Car Services, a Shanghai-based car rental company, is considering a return to the US capital market with an initial public offering that may raise about $300 million as soon as this year, sources say trib.al/rOcGjlf

item.title: 金矿公司 Polymetal 将出售其受制裁的俄罗斯分公司，交易总价值近 37 亿美元
item.description: Gold miner Polymetal will sell its sanctioned Russian unit in a deal worth a total of nearly $3.7 billion trib.al/YqenXsa

item.title: 印尼正在考虑采取更多激励措施，引入更多音乐、体育和文化活动，以吸引游客增加消费和延长逗留时间
item.description: Indonesia is considering more incentives to bring in more music, sports and cultural events that would attract travelers to spend more and stay longer trib.al/s5yQAHz

item.title: 南非财政部长伊诺克-戈东瓦纳（Enoch Godongwana）需要制定一份年度预算，在今年大选带来的支出压力与国家财政部稳定财政的承诺之间取得平衡。
item.description: South Africa's Finance Minister Enoch Godongwana needs to conjure an annual budget that balances spending pressures stemming from this year’s elections with National Treasury’s commitment to stabilize its finances trib.al/VxSXYvI

item.title: 日本承诺在扫雷和农业等七个领域向乌克兰提供重建援助
item.description: Japan pledges to offer reconstruction aid to Ukraine in seven sectors including mine clearance and agriculture trib.al/u84WB1K

item.title: 在政府下调经济增长前景后，埃马纽埃尔-马克龙总统恢复法国赤字累累的公共财政的计划遇到了困难
item.description: President Emmanuel Macron’s plan for restoring France's deficit-ridden public finances is running into difficulties after the government cut the outlook for economic growth trib.al/MrTYIog

item.title: 资产管理公司将日元看跌仓位增至一年多来最高，日本股市随之创下历史新高
item.description: The rally in Japanese stocks toward record highs comes as asset managers increased bearish positions on the yen to the most in more than a year trib.al/qCxS5mH

item.title: 杰富瑞（Jefferies）成为华尔街首家放弃对 Paytm 运营商 One 97 Communications 报道的主要投资银行，"直到围绕这家陷入困境的印度金融科技巨头的新闻流平息下来"。
item.description: Jefferies has become the first major Wall Street investment bank to drop coverage on Paytm-operator One 97 Communications “until the news flow settles down” around the beleaguered Indian fintech major trib.al/MWlYyFq

item.title:
RT by @markets：泰国前总理他信-西那瓦（Thaksin Shinawatra）周日获释，他的家人支持的政党领导的联合政府批准了他的特别假释。
Patpicha Tanakasempipat 报道了这对泰国政治的意义。
item.description:
Former Thai Prime Minister Thaksin Shinawatra was freed from detention on Sunday after the coalition government headed by a party backed by his family granted him a special parole.

Patpicha Tanakasempipat reports on what this means for Thai politics trib.al/8tqWjAc

item.title: 伊拉克将再次向当地和国际公司招标建设磷酸盐厂，该项目估计价值 30 亿美元。
item.description: Iraq will renew its request for bids from both local and international companies to build a phosphate plant in a project estimated to be valued at $3 billion trib.al/CB7JPjN

item.title: 据《商业时报》报道，南非财政部公共财政主管 Mampho Modise 很可能被任命为南非央行副行长
item.description: Mampho Modise, the South African Treasury’s head of public finance, is likely to be named as deputy governor of the nation’s central bank, Business Times reported trib.al/QZhMh1P

item.title: 据法国《世界报》报道，法国消防员一直在扑灭一个约 900 吨锂离子电池储存点的大火。
item.description: Firefighters in France have been battling a blaze at a storage site for some 900 tons of lithium-ion batteries, according to Le Monde newspaper trib.al/1uMnJc2

item.title: 最近，汇丰银行老板诺埃尔-奎恩（Noel Quinn）在英格兰东南部为其高层管理人员举行的务虚会上，描绘了一幅 2023 年的美好前景，同时也警告说，未来的日子将更加艰难。
item.description: At a recent retreat in southeast England for his top executives, HSBC boss Noel Quinn painted a bullish picture for 2023 while warning of tougher times ahead trib.al/Bdqq5fq

item.title: 印度农民在与政府举行最新一轮会谈后暂停了抗议活动，因为他们离达成一项协议以结束农作物价格纠纷的目标越来越近了
item.description: Indian farmers paused their protests after the latest round of talks with the government, as they draw closer to a deal to end a dispute over crop prices trib.al/fMMWBnY

item.title: 泰国第四季度经济增速低于预期，原因可能是游客消费减少导致消费受挫
item.description: Thailand’s economy grew at a slower-than-expected pace in the fourth quarter, as consumption likely suffered on account of lower spending by tourists trib.al/RCq9VCF

item.title: 商品贸易商奥兰公司（Olam）表示，其调查没有发现任何证据支持有关其尼日利亚分公司丑闻的指控。
item.description: Commodity trader Olam said that its investigation found no evidence to support allegations of a reported scandal at its Nigerian units trib.al/VYfFxNL

item.title: 新加坡贸易部长表示，无论谁赢得美国总统大选，新加坡都必须为未来更具挑战性的贸易环境做好准备
item.description: Singapore must be prepared for a more challenging trade environment going forward regardless of who wins the US presidential election, says the city-state's trade minister trib.al/PJOFUL4
